verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of David; <S%H1732><s%> A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> when he was in the cave. <S%H4631><s%> I cried <S%H2199><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with my voice; <S%H6963><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did I make my supplication. <S%H2603><s%>
I poured <S%H8210><s%> out my complaint <S%H7879><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; I showed <S%H5046><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him my trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

When my spirit <S%H7307><s%> was overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me, then you knew <S%H3045><s%> my path. <S%H5410><s%> In the way <S%H734><s%> wherein <S%H2098><s%> I walked <S%H1980><s%> have they privately <S%H2934><s%> laid <S%H2934><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me.

I looked <S%H5027><s%> on my right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and beheld, <S%H7200><s%> but there was no <S%H369><s%> man that would know <S%H5234><s%> me: refuge <S%H4498><s%> failed <S%H6><s%> me; no <S%H369><s%> man cared <S%H1875><s%> for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
I cried <S%H2199><s%> to you, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> You are my refuge <S%H4268><s%> and my portion <S%H2506><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

Attend <S%H7181><s%> to my cry; <S%H7440><s%> for I am brought <S%H1809><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> low: <S%H1809><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from my persecutors; <S%H7291><s%> for they are stronger <S%H553><s%> than I.

Bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of prison, <S%H4525><s%> that I may praise <S%H3034><s%> your name: <S%H8034><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall compass <S%H3803><s%> me about; for you shall deal <S%H1580><s%> bountifully <S%H1580><s%> with me.
